name: Warbler in Space
description:
Leap over craters and race to the goal in this 2D platforming adventure! You'll play as Warbler, an alien on a mission to save the universe from the evil sorcerers Melinda. Be careful to avoid enemies and obstacles, and collect items to earn a super-charged powerup!

Controls:

  • A  :  Move left
  • D  :  Move right
  • Spacebar or W  :  Jump
  • Q  :  Melee attack
  • Mouse Click  :  Ranged attack
  • Hold Shift  :  Run faster

Created for teaching purposes at iD Tech Camps.
https://www.idtech.com
